pageContext.claim: “Rex Tillerson, a man who is 'dumb as a rock' and totally ill prepared and ill equipped to be Secretary of State, made up a story (he got fired) that I was out-prepared by Vladimir Putin at a meeting in Hamburg, Germany. I don't think Putin would agree. Look how the U.S. is doing!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump appointed Tillerson, the former chief executive of Exxon-Mobil, one of the world's largest corporations. Trump had called him “a world-class player” and said his “tenacity, broad experience and deep understanding of geopolitics make him an excellent choice for secretary of state."
